sentence: Instead, she said, there were people defending the insurrectionists and defending Trump and continuing with the challenge and the Big Lie.? Rep. Adam Kinzinger of Illinois, a Republican who, with Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming, has emerged as one of the few GOP anti-Trump critics in Congress, had predicted Trump's hold on the party would be gone? by the summer.
author: Jill Colvin
title: Trump maintains grip on GOP despite violent insurrection
